                <div data-new_design_style="False" data-panel_used_gui="P29" id="P29" style="direction:rtl;">
                 <input aria-labelledby="F10028" id="F10028" name="F10028" type="hidden"/>

                 <script type="text/javascript">
                  function  date()
       {
 		    var dayarray=new Array("ראשון","שני","שלישי","רביעי","חמישי", "שישי","שבת")
         var d = new Date()
        
         var day=d.getDay()
 
 	    	var curr_month = (d.getMonth()+1);
 
         var curr_date = d.getDate();
 
         var curr_year = d.getFullYear();
 		
         document.write('<div class="time">' + " יום " + dayarray[day] + " , " +  curr_date + "." + curr_month + "." + curr_year + '</div>');
       }
                 </script>
                 <script language="JavaScript">
                  function Time()
       {
       Stamp = new Date();
       
           var Hours;
           var Mins;
           var Time;
       
           Hours = Stamp.getHours();
           if (Hours >= 12) {
           Time = " P.M.";
           }
           else {
           Time = " A.M.";
           }
           if (Hours > 12) {
           Hours -= 12;
           }
           if (Hours == 0) {
           Hours = 12;
           }
 
            if (Time ==" P.M.")
           {
          
           }
           else
           {
 
           }
 
           Mins = Stamp.getMinutes();
 
           if (Mins < 10) {
           Mins = "0" + Mins;
           }
 
 
       }
                 </script>
                 <script type="text/javascript">
                  var d = new Date();
                 </script>
                 <table style="padding-right:22px; padding-top:2px;vertical-align:top;">

                   <td class="time">
                    <script>
                     Time();
                    </script>
                   </td>
                  </tr>

                   <td class="time" height="17" nowrap="nowrap">

                     var Data = new Array();

    var Obj= document.getElementById('searchbox');
    var DivListData='autoSuggest13502';
    var ObjId= 'searchbox';
    var ArrRef=null;
    var filename='';
    new AutoSuggest(Obj , Data, DivListData , ObjId ,  ContId, 'autocomplete', filename, ArrRef, 'AllResults');

                 <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
                  function openForgotPasswordWindow()
     {
     var newWin
     newWin = window.open("../bsmart/BSmartFreeHtmls/BSmartPassword.aspx","passwordwindow","toolbar=0,statusbar=0,addressbar=0,width=310,height=274,top=" + (screen.height/2 - 120)  + ",left=" + (screen.width/2 - 160) + ",resizable=0,scrollbars=0");
     newWin.focus();
     }
     function createRedirectURL()
 
     {
 
     var url="signup.aspx"
 
     var returnpage=getUrlParam('returnpage')
 
     if (returnpage) url=url+"?returnpage="+returnpage
 
     return url;
 
     }
     function createRedirectURL1()
 
     {
 
     var url="loginpage.aspx"
 
     var returnpage="afterlogin.aspx"
 
     if (returnpage) url=url+"?returnpage="+returnpage
 
     return url;
 
     }
                 </script>

              <div class="site_padding" data-new_design_style="False" data-panel_used_gui="P2" id="P2" style="direction:rtl;">
               <script type="text/javascript">
                function JustifyMenu ()   
   {   
     var menu = $find("ctl01_RadMenu1");     
     var width = menu.get_element().offsetWidth ;     
     var singleItemLength = Math.floor(width/menu.get_items().get_count())-1+"px";     
    // due to incorrect rounding;     
    // You may need to subtract a larger number depending on     
    // the skin that you are using.      
           
     for (var i = 0; i < menu.get_items().get_count(); i ++)     
     {     
        var li = menu.get_items().getItem(i).get_element();       
        li.style.width = singleItemLength;     
      }     
    }
               </script>
               <link href="/RadControls/menu/skins/Custom/Menu.Custom.css" rel="Stylesheet" type="text/css"/>

                    <td>
                     <script language="javascript">
                      AC_FL_RunContent = 0;
                     </script>
                     <script language="javascript" src="../design/JScripts/AC_RunActiveContent.js">
                     </script>
                     <script language="javascript">
                      if (AC_FL_RunContent == 0) {
                   alert("This page requires AC_RunActiveContent.js.");
                 } else {
               AC_FL_RunContent(
                 'codebase', 'https://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=9,0,0,0',
                 'width', '985',
                 'height', '380',
                 'src', 'gallaryX',
                 'quality', 'high',
                 'pluginspage', 'https://www.macromedia.com/go/getflashplayer',
                 'align', 'middle',
                 'play', 'true',
                 'loop', 'true',
                 'scale', 'showall',
                 'wmode', 'transparent',
                 'devicefont', 'false',
                 'id', 'gallaryX',            
                 'name', 'gallaryX',
                 'menu', 'true',
                 'allowFullScreen', 'false',
                 'allowScriptAccess','www.mashtelaadhabait.com',

                 </div>
                </td>
                <td align="right" nowrap="nowrap" style="padding-top:3px;" width="150">

   </form>
   <script type="text/javascript">

 			if (!hasAccessibility) 
 			{
 				jQuery(window).load(function(){
 					jQuery('head').append('<script type="text/javascript" src="/bsmart/BSmartJScripts/accessability_menu.js"><\/script>;')
 					jQuery('#skiplist').prependTo('body');
 				});
